step_0_quick_start.title: Let's Build Your Store
step_0_quick_start.subtitle: Import from social media or start fresh - takes less than 5 minutes

options.label: Import from Social Media
options.description: Auto-fill from your Instagram, Facebook, or TikTok

business_name.label: Business Name
hints: Make it memorable and easy to spell
Include your specialty if possible
Avoid special characters

tagline.label: Tagline (Optional)
tagline.placeholder: e.g. Best Doubles in South Trinidad
hints: Keep it short and catchy
Highlight what makes you unique

step_2_design_branding.title: Design Your Brand
step_2_design_branding.subtitle: Create a professional look that stands out

logo.label: Business Logo
hints: Upload your existing logo or let AI create one
Square logos work best (1:1 ratio)
High resolution recommended (1000x1000px)

color_scheme.label: Brand Colors
hints: Choose colors that match your brand personality
AI can suggest palettes based on your logo
Ensure good contrast for readability

step_3_store_details.title: Store Details
step_3_store_details.subtitle: Help customers find and contact you

description.label: Business Description
description.placeholder: Tell customers what makes your business special...
hints: Describe what you offer and what makes you unique
Include key products or services
Mention your location or delivery area

whatsapp_number.label: WhatsApp Business Number

verification.skip_warning: Your store won't be live until you verify your number

hints: Enter your Trinidad number (must start with 1868)
This will be your main contact for orders
We'll send a verification code

location.label: Business Location

area.placeholder: e.g. Chaguanas, San Fernando, Port of Spain

hints: Pin your exact location on the map
Customers will use this to find you

gallery_images.label: Gallery Images (Optional)
hints: Add photos of your products, location, or team
High-quality images attract more customers
We'll optimize them automatically

step_4_preview_launch.subtitle: Review your store and go live
